episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 27: Swedish Racism
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.


In our 27th episode, the Girls Necks Door welcome Maddi and Christina’s little sister, Rachel, as a guest host. We read some listener e-mails and discuss recent news, including Summit’s decision to fire Rachel LaFeyette. We swoon over Edward’s Swoonworthy Quote, where he asks for Charlie’s approval of his marriage to Bella. We laugh at A-Ray’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week and discuss the song for this week, which is “Human” by The Killers. If you would like to contact the show, you can email us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com, comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com, or you can be our friend on MySpace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our Facebook group. Make sure you check out our t-shirts at cafepress.com/bloodsuckers, rate us on iTunes and vote for us on Podcast Alley!


NOTE: You need Quicktime player or any program that plays m4a files to download our podcasts.

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 26: Dissecting India
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download the episode here.

In our 26th episode, the Girls Necks Door read some listener e-mails and share our gross biology stories.  We discuss the news, including the new New Moon teaser trailer.  We swoon over Edward’s Swoonworthy Quote, “I’ve been waiting a century to marry you, Miss Swan.”  We also ponder over what Emily’s vampower would be and laugh at A-Ray’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week.  We also have some important announcements.  The song for this week is “This is for Keeps” by The Spill Canvas.  If you would like to contact the show, you can email us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com, comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com, or you can be our friend on MySpace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our Facebook group. Make sure you check out our t-shirts at cafepress.com/bloodsuckers, rate us on iTunes and vote for us on Podcast Alley!


And remember, send your questions for our interviews with the Forks Chief of Police, the principal of Forks High School, Mitch Hansen, and Kaleb Nation to bloodsuckersforks@gmail.com.  You can also tell us you're going to Forks!


NOTE: You need Quicktime player or any program that plays m4a files to download our podcasts.

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 25: Because We Feel Like It
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the 25th episode, we discuss some listener emails and recent Twilight news, including Dakota Fanning’s official casting as Jane for the new movie. We also discuss some books to read if you’ve already read the Twilight series 9,438,557 times and are looking for something new to read. Christina shares Bella’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week, and Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote of the Week is swooned over. We predict what scenes will probably be awesome in “New Moon”, and discuss the Song of the Week, which is “1,2,3,4” by Plain White T’s. If you would like to contact the show, you can email us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com, comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com, or you can be our friend on MySpace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our Facebook group. Make sure you check out our t-shirts at cafepress.com/bloodsuckers, rate us on iTunes and vote for us on Podcast Alley!

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Special Edition 5: Mostly Music
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download the episode here.

In this Special Edition: Mostly Music episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door have an episode of all listener e-mails, jokes, contests, and music! The songs in the episode are “Love Story” by Taylor Swift, “Superman (Save You)” by The Friday Night Boys, “Stop & Stare” by OneRepublic, “Thinking of You” by Katy Perry, “I’m Yours” by Jason Mraz, “That Green Gentleman” by Panic at the Disco, and “Must Have Done Something Right” by Relient K. We also discuss the news, our boyfriend contest, a joke, and a quote. If you'd like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or you can join our facebook group. Don't forget to vote for us on podcast alley and review us on iTunes. If you'd like more information on Summer School in Forks, visit their website.

And now, a conversation with Nonexistant Bloodsuckers fan:

NBF: WHOA COOL SECTION TITLES ON THE PODCAST!
Gayle: I know right? Aren't I awesome?

NBF: And new artwork!
Gayle: Yes! Lauren made it for us! Isn't it just swell?

NBF: Why wasn't this released a month ago?
Gayle: I'm sorry. We have no excuse. I was too lazy to edit it.. and then a month went by.

NBF: Can you guys please fix your audio, this whole cutting out thing is terrible.
Gayle: Yeah. We're working on it. We're not sure why we're having these problems.

NBF: Where's February's episode?
Gayle: ...uhhhm. Well, March's will be recorded this weekend =).

NBF: Where is Guy #1's picture on the poll?
Gayle: I forgot. I'm sorry.

NBF: Should I go to Forks Summer School?
Gayle: Absolutely.

Who is your favorite Girl Necks Door?

View Results
Create a Blog Poll



Who is the Edwardiest/Jacobiest Boyfriend?

View Results
Create a Blog Poll

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 24: We Love Little Sisters
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download the episode here.

The Girls Necks Door present their first episode of the new year! We discuss listener e-mails as well as some news including the release date of the new upcoming New Moon movie. We also discuss a Swoon-Worthy quote, "“When I told you that I didn't want you, it was the very blackest kind of blasphemy." This week, we laugh at Kacie's Cheesy Vampire Joke. We end the show with our Song of the Week, "100 Years" by Five for Fighting. If you'd like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or you can join our facebook group. Don't forget to vote for us on podcast alley and review us on iTunes. If you'd like more information on Summer School in Forks, visit their website.

And now, a conversation with Nonexistant Bloodsuckers fan:

NBF: Where did Janae Go? Why does everyone keep disappearing?
Gayle: The internet connection was terrible. Janae’s internet died and mine wasn’t much better. Sorry.

NBF: What was that recurring ringing sound?
Gayle: When a Skype call gets dropped, we re-call the person. Skype is epically cute, it rings.

NBF: I've already voted in this poll. Why is it different?
Gayle: Sorry. I accidentally deleted it while trying to upload the episode. I suh sahri.

NBF: Taylor Lautner was confirmed as Jacob Black for New Moon. What are you guys talking about?
Gayle: Sorry, we recorded this episode on January 3rd. Taylor Lautner wasn't guaranteed the part until the 7th.

NBF: OH I LOVE YOU ALL SO MUCH. WHO SHOULD I VOTE FOR?
Gayle: Anyone but A-Ray. She kills small children.

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 23: The Curse Of A-Ray
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download the episode here.

After a long wait, the Girls Necks Door are back! We discuss listener e-mails about the Twilight movie, as well as some news about the upcoming New Moon movie. We also discuss a Swoon-Worthy quote, "You're intoxicated by my very presence." This week, we laugh at Megan's Cheesy Vampire Joke. We end the show with our Song of the Week, "Hurricane, the Informal Weather Pattern" by Something Corporate. If you'd like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or you can join our facebook group. Don't forget to vote for us on podcast alley and review us on iTunes. If you'd like more information on Summer School in Forks, visit their website.

And now, a conversation with Nonexistant Bloodsuckers fan.

NBF: OMG you guys what lies are you spreading about Catherine directed the next movie? That's not true!
Maddi: Yeah...our bad.

NBF: What is all of that horrendous noise in the background?
Maddi: My family. Please forgive me, and pray for the health of my laptop.

NBF: OMG where'd Christina go? Did you kill her in the middle of the episode?
Maddi: No, she had to go to dance class. She's alive, I swear.

NBF: Have you ever heard of audio quality? Why can't i hear A-Ray?
Gayle: I thought it'd be funny to let Maddi record everyone on one line. I promise it will never happen again.

episodes.title: HEY GUYS GUESS WHAT
episodes.author: bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com (The Girls Necks Door)
episodes.summary:
SUMMER SCHOOL IN FORKS: A TWILIGHT SYMPOSIUM ANNOUNCES NEW SPEAKERS
Twilight Guy BBQ, Bloodsuckers, and Letterman Jackets

Kaleb Nation--everyone's favorite Twilight guy--will be delivering a Keynote Address at a special luncheon during Summer School in Forks. Convention attendees will be able to purchase tickets for this barbecue luncheon during registration. Seating is limited.

SSIF is also proud to announce that The Bloodsuckers, aka The Girls Necks Door, will be presenting a live podcast from Forks High School during the convention. Attendance and participation is included in convention registration.

Everyone needs a jacket in Forks! Now attendees of SSIF will be able to order their very own, individualized, personalized FORKS HIGH SCHOOL LETTERMAN JACKETS. The official vendor to the school will be available to take your measurements and help you accessorize your jacket with specially selected Twilight-themed patches and lettering. Show your Twilight school spirit! And if you order during our convention, you will receive a special 10% discount offered only during SSIF.

A-Ray makes us groan with Hannah-Marie’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week. Gayle makes a few announcements, and we discuss the Song of the Week, which is “Hey Now Girl” by Phantom Planet. episodes.title: ...Where are the Girls Necks Door?
episodes.author: bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com (The Girls Necks Door)
episodes.summary:
Hey Guys. Non-existent bloodsuckers fan is back to explain a few things.

Non-existent bloodsuckers fan: ZOMG HAVE YOU HEARD ABOUT MIDNIGHT SUN!
Gayle: Yes. Yes we have.

NBF: IVE SENT IN 2934 EMAILS AND NO ONE HAS RESPONDED. THERE HASNT BEEN AN EPISODE IN OVER A WEEK! WHERE IN THE WORLD ARE YOU GIRLS!
Gayle: Yeah... about that. Hi! First of all, we're all alive no worries. But, we all start school Wednesday and have a lot of summer reading to do. Maddi Aray and Christina are at the shore, and cant answer emails from there. I have been computer-less lately, and can't have access again until I'm done summer reading. And Janae, well, Janae's never been much of an email checker. We promise we'll get to it. I hope.

NBF: That was just about the emails, but where is this weeks episode? It's already... monday! Don't the episodes come out on Sundays?
Gayle: This week's episode had some... technical difficulties. Basically, A-Ray and Janae's tracks were not sent in their entirety and when I finally realized, A-Ray was already away and we had no hopes of getting the tracks back. BUT, tomorrow we will record a Midnight Sun reaction episode, and that will have to serve as this weeks episode. We will return to regular scheduling next week.

NBF: I hate bloodsuckers. You're all slackers.
Gayle: I'm sorry. Free hugs all around. But this weeks episode was actually all about that, well the resently large amount of "hate mail" we've been getting. So, please stop hating us. We're sorry you all feel that way. We'll start having the episodes back out ASAP, promise!

NBF: Do you atleast have any good news?
Gayle: Yes! I'll let you know what the listener challenge for this week was! And ill even send maddi some funny snippets from this weeks episode to include as bloopers on the Midnight Sun episode =).

LISTENER CHALLENGE: Send in 3 things you liked about Breaking Dawn and/or Bloodsuckers to bloodsuckerspodast@gmail.com. If you figure out how to get this in picture form, well post it right here on the website.

Love always,
Gayle and the rest of the Girls Necks Door

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 21: SMeyer Science
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the 21st episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door discuss some listener e-mails, including some about Jacob and Renesmee. We talk about some news, including the possibility of a Twilight conference. For our character profile, we discuss Renee Dwyer. In our made-up Rumors section, we discuss the possibility of a Midnight Sun leak and New Moon Movie. We swoon over our Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote Of The Week, "I’ll meet you at the altar", which was suggested by our listener Tesa. We laugh at Lucy’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week. We discuss Renee’s Vampower. Gayle makes a few announcements and reminders. We wrap up the show with the song of the week, “One More Weekend” by The Academy Is…. Stay tuned at the end of the episode for a special blooper reel. Go to cafepress.com/bloodsuckers to check out our t-shirts and help support the show. Remember, if you’d like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on Myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our Facebook group. Please remember to review us on iTunes and to vote for us on Podcast Alley.

And now, an imaginary conversation with Maddi and a nonexistent Bloodsuckers fan.

Nonexistent Bloodsuckers Fan: Maddi, why is this episode up so late? What kind of slacker are you?
Maddi: Well, nonexistent Bloodsuckers fan, my computer hates me and the internet refused to work, so I used my magical power of turning of the computer all day to make it work. It would have been up last night, but Gayle’s dad had to go to the hospital. No worries, everything’s fine, but it was kind of inconvenient.

NBF: But Maddi, why is Christina and your audio quality so terrible? Are there flies attacking your house? Is there a parade of elephants walking through your room?
M: This is my fault. I broke my laptop, so until I get it fixed, Christina and I are stuck with the family computer, which is terrible at recording and in a room where there’s usually a lot of noisy people.

NBF: Maddi, what are you talking about? I'm an iTunes subscriber and I can download Episode 20 perfectly fine.
M: Again, my magical powers of doing absolutely nothing.

NBF: Hey, I suggested that Adorable Quote! Why didn’t you give me any credit?
M: I forgot. Sorry, Tesa.

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 20: Molly Peed on Me!
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the 20th episode of Bloodsuckers: A Twilight Podcast, Janae Christina and Maddi are all missing. So, A-Ray and Gayle invite two very special people on the show to podcast with them, Gayle’s cousin Zoe and A-Ray’s guinea pig Molly. We discuss the recent news, read some listener emails, and even sing a song! Then, in our character profile discussion, we discuss Leah. Our Adorable Edward Quote was “I’ll sing all night if it will keep the bad dreams away” from Breaking Dawn. We had a very funny cheesey joke, and then discussed Jacob and Zoe’s powers on our Vampowers segment. We had a very long announcements segment, and then discussed Bubbly as our song of the week. Stay tuned at the end of the episode for an extra long bloopers reel! Go to cafepress.com/bloodsuckers to check out our t-shirts and help support the show. Remember, if you’d like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on Myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our Facebook group. Please remember to review us on iTunes and to vote for us on Podcast Alley.

episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the sixteenth episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door chose to cheat, like we do so often, and have an episode of all listener e-mails and song discussions! The songs in the episode are “Chasing Cars” by Snow Patrol, “Faster” by Plain White T's, “True To Me” by Metro Station, “Good Morning Beautiful” by Steve Holy, “The Reason” by Hoobastank, “I See Monsters” by Ryan Adams, and “Everytime We Touch” by Cascada. We also discuss the new movie trailer, as well as the Breaking Dawn Quotes of the Day that have been released so far. Remember, if you’d like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on Myspace or join our Facebook group.

Note: Christina, Gayle, and Maddi apologize for thinking it was a good idea to be eating peanuts during the episode.

episodes.title: Episode 16 and Release Party Info
episodes.author: bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com (The Girls Necks Door)
episodes.summary:
Hey everybody,

Just wanted to give you all an update about what's going on. The next episode, Episode 16, is going to be released a little late this week, probably Monday, since Christina and I were at camp all week. Our poll results showed that most of you guys wanted another all-music episode. No worries to the opposers, though, because we will be having other discussions about the Breaking Dawn Quotes of the Day and the new trailer as well.

Also, we've finalized our plans for the release of Breaking Dawn. Christina, A-Ray, Janae, and I will all be at the Mount Laurel Library in New Jersey for their Twilight party on August 1 from 1:00-3:00. If you're in the area please come for some Girls Necks Door-hosted discussion. More information about that here.

Later, at 9:30 pm, all five of us will be at the Borders in Mount Laurel, NJ for the midnight release party. More information about that here. If you see any of us there, please come say hi! I will probably be wearing my Bloodsuckers t-shirt. Otherwise you can see what we all look like in the picture post below. If you find us, we may have a little treat for you :)

Feel free to e-mail us with any questions about these events. Apologies to everyone who has e-mailed that we haven't replied to. Since I've been away all week we've gotten a bit behind, but we promise you'll get a response soon.

Much love,
Maddi and the rest of the Girls Necks Door

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 15: Happy Birthday Corn Dog
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the 15th episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door read some listener e-mails and also spaz a bit about A-Ray’s birthday. Send her some Happy Birthday e-mails! We discuss some news, including Stephenie’s plea to prevent online spoiling and the feature of the Twilight movie in the upcoming Entertainment Weekly. The subject of the character profile segment was Esme Cullen. We discuss this week’s scene of the week which was Bella’s first day of school from Twilight. We swoon, as usual, about Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote Of The Week, "Bring on the shackles, I’m now your prisoner". We laugh at Gayle’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week. We discuss Mike Newton and Janae’s vampowers on our newest segment suggested by Belmo. We discuss Stuttering by Ben’s Brother, for our Song Of The Week. (Yes, it’s the song from the Dentyne Ice commercial) We make quite a few special announcements, including that t-shirts are for sale and to keep voting for us on Podcast Alley. Stay tuned at the end of the episode for a special blooper reel. Go to www.cafepress.com/bloodsuckers to check out our t-shirts and help support the show. Remember, if you’d like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on Myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our Facebook group. Please remember to review us on iTunes!

Alex made us baked goods. We love her.

episodes.title: Another All Music Episode?
episodes.author: bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com (The Girls Necks Door)
episodes.summary:
Hey everybody,

We were planning our future episodes and wanted to hear your opinions. For those of you who have been listening to us for awhile, you may recall our Episode 8, in which we only discussed music, sort of the "Song of the Week" segment times 10. Did you guys enjoy that format and would you like to see it again? Please take our poll and let us know. Thanks for helping us make the show more enjoyable!

In the 14th episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door read some listener e-mails. We discuss some news, including the new books to be added to the Twilight Saga. Instead of a character profile discussion, we had a Edward vs. Jacob debate. We swoon, as usual, about Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote Of The Week, "And so the lion fell in love with the lamb". We laugh at Shelby’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week. We discuss Angela and Christina’s vampowers on our newest segment suggested by Belmo. We discuss When the Day Met the Night by Panic at the Disco, suggested by Cal D, for our Song Of The Week. We make quite a few special announcements, including that t-shirts are for sale and a special "Pokemon" listener challenge. Stay tuned at the end of the episode for a special blooper reel. We discuss some news, especially a funny popstar site. Emmett Cullen is featured in our character profile. We swoon, as usual, about Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote Of The Week, "You compare one tree to an entire forest". We laugh at Shelby’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week. episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 12: Get Ready To Vrock
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the 12th episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door read some listener e-mails. We discuss some news, including interviews and birthdays. Instead of a character profile, the Girls Necks Door are very excited to interview Katie from Bella Rocks! and Mitch Hansen from The Mitch Hansen Band. We swoon, as usual, about Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote Of The Week. We laugh at A-Ray’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week. We discuss Only One by Yellowcard, suggested by Jonathan, for our Song Of The Week. We make a special announcement: t-shirts are for sale! Go to www.cafepress.com/bloodsuckers to check it out! Also, stayed tune at the end of the show for another blooper reel. Remember, if you’d like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on Myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our Facebook group.
If you’d like to listen to the music we featured this week, make sure to check out their myspaces. You can listen to Bella Rocks! at myspace.com/bellarocksmusic. You can listen to The Mitch Hansen Band at myspace.com/mitchhansenband or go to themitchhansenband.com.

Special thanks to Alex for emailing in a cute picture of a "bloodsucking spider monkey". This may be funnier than A-Ray's Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week.

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 11: Michael Jackson plays Carlisle!
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the 11th episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door answer some listener questions and respond to some comments. We discuss some news and celebrate Edward's birthday. The character profile this week is Carlisle, Edward's "father", in honor of Father's Day. We also include a few interview with some real live boys, thanks Daniel and Joaquim. The featured scene of the week is when Bella, Edward, and Alice get back from Italy, and then there's a rather humorous Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote of the week. We have A Ray’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week. We end the show by discussing how She Will Be Loved by Maroon 5 relates to the Twilight series. Remember, if you’d like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@gmail.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on Myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our Facebook group.

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 10: ZOMG First Chapter!
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the tenth episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door answer some listener questions and respond to some comments, as well as read a poem by a fan. We discuss some news and freak out about the first chapter and cover of Breaking Dawn. The character profile this week is James, the tracker vampire who tried to kill Bella. The featured scene of the week is the meadow scene with Bella and Edward. Swooning happens, as usual, over Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote of the week. And this week it was Lauren’s instead of A Ray’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week. We end the show by discussing how I’ll Run by The Cab relates to the Twilight series. Also, stay tuned at the end of the episode for a special blooper reel. Remember, if you’d like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@yahoo.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on Myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our Facebook group.

Note: Because the Girls Necks Door have their finals next week, there will be not be a new episode. See you all in two weeks!

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 9: Everyone's A Werewolf
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the ninth episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door answer some listener questions and respond to some comments, as well as read a poem by a fan. We discuss some news, including many interviews and mention of a Breaking Dawn release party for British fans. The character profile this week is Sam Uley, the leader of the La Push pack. We talk about the Denali coven during our Unanswered Questions section, where we ask, “Will the vampires from Alaska be important?” We swoon, as usual, over Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote of the week. This week it was Fiona’s instead of A Ray’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week. We end the show by discussing how See You Again by Miley Cyrus relates to the Twilight series. And don’t forget the listener challenges! Also, stay tuned at the end of the episode for a special blooper reel. Remember, if you’d like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@yahoo.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on Myspace or join our Facebook group.

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 8: Moooosic
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the eighth episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door chose to cheat, like we do so often, and have an episode of all listener e-mails and song discussions! The songs in the episode are “Who I Am Hates Who I’ve Been” by Reliant K, “Wine Red” by the Hush Sound, “Untouched” by the Veronicas, “Fall for You” by Secondhand Serenade, “Never Alone” by Barlow Girl, “Just Friends” by the Jonas Brothers, “I Miss You” by Blink182, “Black Roses Red” by Alana Grace, “Ordinary Day” by Vanessa Carlton and “About Us” by Daft Punk. And, just in case the listeners didn’t know, GAYLE MADE THE INTRO, so we’re giving her credit! Remember, if you’d like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@yahoo.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on Myspace or join our Facebook group. Also, keep a look-out for our new website, bloodsuckerspodcast.com, coming soon!

NOTE: The version that was previously up cut off 3 minutes early. If you downloaded the episode before 5:30 EST on Sunday, download it again. Sorry for the inconvenience.

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 7: Vampire Wars In Texas
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the seventh episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door answer some listener questions and respond to some comments. We discuss some news, including many interviews with Stephenie Meyer. The character profile this week is Jasper Hale, who is also featured in our Scene of the Week when we discuss Bella’s birthday party. We talk about imprinting during our Unanswered Questions section, where we ask, “Will Jacob ever get over Bella?” We swoon, as usual, over Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote of the week, and pick our Favorite scene from the teaser trailer. Gayle creates her own Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week. She also presents a few Listener Challenges. We end the show by discussing how Hospital Bed Crawl by The Hush Sound relates to the Twilight series. Remember, if you’d like to contact the show, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@yahoo.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also be our friend on Myspace or join our Facebook group. Also, keep a look-out for our new website, bloodsuckerspodcast.com, coming soon!

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Special Edition 1: Teaser Trailer
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.


On this special edition of Bloodsuckers: A Twilight Podcast, we discuss the newly released teaser trailor for the upcoming Twilight Movie! We go through the trailer part by part discussing the trailer in depth, and discussing what we think of the actors. Check out the trailor on our website at www.bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com, and feel free to email in to bloodsuckerspodcast@yahoo.com. You can also be friends with us on myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or you join our group on facebook. You can also vote for us podcast alley, the address for which can be found on out site!

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 6: Where The Smart People Go
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

We release our sixth episode a day early since Maddi and Christina will be on vacation. In the episode, the Girls Necks Door discuss some interesting news about videos and footage for the upcoming movie. We received many emails from listeners in the past week, and we share some of them. We cheat on the character discussion and talk about Bella’s friends at school, including Angela, Ben, Tyler, Mike, Lauren, Eric, and Jessica. The Unanswered Question is: Will the vampires and werewolves go to war? The campfire scene in Twilight is discussed as the Scene of the Week. We act girly over Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote of the Week, Gayle takes over A-Ray’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week, and a new challenge is presented. The episode is concluded with the Song of the Week, JamisonParker’s “Best Mistake”. Any questions, comments, suggestions, challenges, or free puppies can be emailed to bloodsuckerspodcast@yahoo.com, or posted on our blog on http://www.bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com/. You can also be our friend on MySpace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our Facebook group.

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 5: Sneezing Evilly
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the fifth episode of Bloodsuckers, the Girls Necks Door talk about some Twilight news, including the new MTV special. Many listeners contacted us this week, and we discuss some interesting e-mails. We also talk about the character Victoria, as well as whether or not we feel the Twilight series is feminist. The Unanswered Question this week is: Who will Bella tell about becoming a vampire? We discuss Victoria further in our Scene of the Week section. Edward’s Nauseatingly Adorable Quote of the Week this week makes us all swoon. In our Favorites section, we talk about our favorite locations in the book. Christina takes over A-Ray’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week, and Gayle and Maddi obsess over Metro Station when we discuss their song “Seventeen Forever”. If you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or just want to say hi, you can e-mail us at bloodsuckerspodcast@yahoo.com or comment on our blog at bloodsuckerspodcast.blogspot.com. You can also become our friend on Myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast or join our group on Facebook.

episodes.title: Bloodsuckers Episode 4: Vampires In Black
episodes.author: The Girls Necks Door
episodes.summary:
Download episode here.

In the 4th episode of Bloodsuckers, The Girls Necks Door discuss some more of the latest Twilight-related news, including cast interviews, release parties for Breaking Dawn, and multiple movie-set reports. This week’s character profile discussion is Cheif Charlie Swan. Next is the Unanswered Question segment. We discuss whether Edward and Bella will have a peaceful and uninterrupted wedding. The following scene of the week took place in Twilight in the chapter “Port Angeles” when Edward takes Bella to dinner at the Italian restaurant. A new segment entitled Swoon-Worthy: Edward’s Nauseatingly Adoreable Quote of the Week was introduced next. Next comes the Favorites section in which the hosts’ favorite books of the series are discussed. Another new segment, A-Ray’s Cheesy Vampire Joke of the Week follows. The show was rounded out with the song of the week; The World Has Its Shine by Cobra Starship. Any questions, comments, suggestions (and now submissions for the joke of the week) can be emailed to bloodsuckerspodcast@yahoo.com. You can be our friend on myspace at myspace.com/bloodsuckerspodcast, join our facebook group, or leave a comment here on our blog.

And we would like to let everyone that today is our co-host Christina's birthday, so make sure to send her some birthday love!
